subject: Prices (Fares, Fees and Rates)
Oil (Petroleum) and Gasoline
Travel and Vacations
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar fans are famous for traveling long distances to watch races, but with gas at $4 a gallon, or higher, they are being forced to rethink their travel plans.
snippet: Nascar fans are famous for traveling long distances to watch races, but with gas at $4 a gallon, or higher, they are being forced to rethink their travel plans.
